response.answer_text: This is It-Melba Moore  Queen-Killer Queen  Led Zeppelin-Stairway to Heaven  Shalamar-Second Time Around  Diana Ross-Upside Down  Pointer Sisters-Slow Hand  Billy Joel-Movin’Out  Marvin Gaye-Got To Give It Up  Atlantic Starr-Secret Lovers  Roberta Flack & Donny Hathaway-Back Together Again  Michael Jackson-Human Nature  David Bowie-Changes  Prince-Anotherloverholenyohead  Harold Melvin and The Blue Notes-Hope We Can Be Together Soon  Madonna-Material Girl  Force M.D.’s-Touch and Go

What's a good 70s-80s playlist? I found one with 70’s and 80’s playlist, for you with 425 songs, it’s from a Youtube channel called Objects in Motion. Here is the link to the channel: Objects in Motion Here is the link to his/her playlist:  Enjoy to happy listening, and thank you for your question Panda Lee. Best regards, Christian Dittel
